summary: Industrial Soundtrack For The Urban Decay traces the origins of Industrial music, taking you on a journey through the crumbling industrial cities of Europe to America's thriving avant-garde scene.
cast: Mark Albrow|Stefan Alt|Chris Carter|Graham Cunnington|Cosey Fanni Tutti|Klive Humberstone|Nigel Humberstone|Dirk Ivens|Paul Jamrozy|Stephen Mallinder|Adi Newton|Richard Oddie|Genesis P-Orridge|Graeme Revell|Boyd Rice|Adrian Smith|Derek Smith|Frédéric Temps|Jean-Pierre Turmel|V. Vale|Ron Wright|Z'Ev
title: Industrial Soundtrack for the Urban Decay
